about_the_game:
What kind of game is Happy Telepathy?

Happy Telepathy is an adventure game in which protagonist Miru Kokonagi, a girl who possesses the ability to understand others' thoughts, uses her gift to help solve her friends' problems. Use hints gained through telepathic powers to decide Miru's next move! Jam-packed with merry moments, heartfelt happenings, fuzzy feelings, and all things cute!

Story

One day, when Miru is watching TV, she eyes a horoscope saying that good things will come to those who help others. Always the type to believe in astrology, Miru vows to help her friends that day as she sets off for school. Just how many good deeds can she fit in one day?!

Protagonist: Miru Kokonagi
A girl who can somehow understand what others are thinking thanks to her telepathic powers. Though the quiet type and not one to stand out, her communication skills are top-notch, perhaps due to her telepathy, earning her the admiration of those around her.

Game Features

・Enjoy conversations with fellow classmates!
Go about your usual day at school casually chatting with the boys and girls. You choose what words Miru says as you progress through the game.

・Help solve others' problems with telepathy!
Sometimes people hide their true feelings in conversation. Use your telepathy to find out what your classmates are truly thinking to help them out to the best of your ability.

Make any ordinary day a happy one!
In this game, you'll experience just a little sliver of the everyday life of school kids. Though your decisions may not seem to make a dramatic difference, they can take an ordinary day and fill it with happiness!
